title: Tammy leaves CFC
body: Tammy Abraham leaves Chelsea for €40m to join Jose Mourinho’s Roma.T-shirtTammy will wear the no9 shirt. General Manager Tiago Pinto,posing with Tammy Abraham to officially announce the deal.
